timeline.bodyText: This test does not have any assertion...is this intended or an omission?
timeline.author: dadepo

replies.bodyText: It's intentional, the parser shouldn't throw an exception on a negative channel id (I annotated the method accordingly). This field is skipped so I can't check the value after parsing.
replies.author: eshryane

timeline.message: Test that no exception is thrown on a negative channel id.
